alert.note: Alert for Gogebic (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:25PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Gogebic County through 800 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saxon, or 13 miles west of Ironwood, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ironwood, Bessemer, Hurley and Ironwood Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized ponding of water on roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
